description: Retrieves information about the specified contact or escalation plan.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact or escalation plan.

nested_items.name: ContactArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the contact or escalation plan.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: The alias of the contact or escalation plan. The alias is unique and identifiable.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The full name of the contact or escalation plan.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of contact, either PERSONAL or ESCALATION.

nested_items.name: Stages
nested_items.description: A list of stages that the escalation plan or engagement plan uses to engage contacts and contact methods.

nested_items.name: DurationInMinutes
nested_items.description: The time to wait until beginning the next stage. The duration can only be set to 0 if a target is specified.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

nested_items.name: ChannelTargetInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the contact channel Incident Manager is engaging.

nested_items.name: ContactChannelId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel.

nested_items.name: RetryIntervalInMinutes
nested_items.description: The number of minutes to wait to retry sending engagement in the case the engagement initially fails.

nested_items.name: ContactTargetInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the contact that Incident Manager is engaging.

nested_items.name: ContactId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

nested_items.name: IsEssential
nested_items.description: A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan.

nested_items.name: RotationIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the on-call rotations associated with the plan.
